page.title: 11St Catherine's School
page.content: One of the primary schools in Launceston is St Catherine's which has about 241 pupils. There are 7 classes and a nursery for children who only come in the morning.There are 6 full time teachers and 2 part time ones.There is a staffroom, headmaster's office, 3 sets of toilets,classrooms,a swimming pool,sports field, garden and a pond.In the main hall there is a bell which they used to ring at break and lunchtime but now its been replaced by an electric one. The food ranges at St Catherine's from curry to sandwiches. There are 7 dinner ladies who cook it.For children who like gym,chess,and computers the school runs special clubs after school. Gym club is on Tuesdays and Thursdays from 3.30 to 4.30 St Catherine's is a very happy school.
